overview: Tomer Doron is a technologist and entrepreneur. He spent the first years of his career developing enterprise software as a service solutions for fortune 100 companies as the CTO of WorkplaceIQ and the VP of Product and Technology of Siterra Corporation. He later co-founded and was the CTO of PangeaTools, an award winning educational technology shop recently bought by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt. Tomer holds a law degree from the University of Tel-Aviv and is a Singularity University graduate.
